Package com.agenarisk.api.model

Class Settings

java.lang.Object
com.agenarisk.api.model.Settings
All Implemented Interfaces:
Storable
public class Settings extends Object implements Storable
This is a class for Model calculation settings.
Author:
Eugene Dementiev

  • Method Details

    • loadSettings

      public static void loadSettings(Model model, org.json.JSONObject jsonSettings)
      Utility method to load settings from the provided JSON to the provided Model.
      For any missing fields, current model settings (or defaults) will be used.
      Parameters:
      model - Model to load settings to
      jsonSettings - JSON to load settings from

    • loadSettings

      public static void loadSettings(uk.co.agena.minerva.model.Model logicModel, org.json.JSONObject jsonSettings)
      Utility method to load settings from the provided JSON to the provided API1 Model.
      For any missing fields, current model settings (or defaults) will be used.
      Parameters:
      logicModel - API1 Model to load settings to
      jsonSettings - JSON to load settings from
